messages:
Name: Çaglar Söyüncü
Nationality: Türkiye
Date of Birth: May 23, 1996
Position: Defender
Current club: Atlético Madrid
LaLiga clubs played for: Atlético Madrid

Atlético Madrid defender Çaglar Söyüncü has not taken part in a high proportion of the team's LaLiga games in 2023/2024, making six appearances overall and accumulating 111 minutes of playing time. He has been selected in the starting XI in one of these appearances across their 21 fixtures and been mostly used off the bench on five occasions.

The last time that Söyüncü featured in the league came on December 23 for Atlético Madrid against Sevilla; a game that he played just four minutes in during a 1-0 win. Unfortunately for both Söyüncü and Atlético Madrid, he was sent off in this match.
Atlético Madrid, who have 44 points are in third spot in the standings, play host to Rayo Vallecano on January 31 the next time the team are in LaLiga action.
Söyüncü played seven Premier League games last season for Leicester City and scored one goal.
Söyüncü joined Atlético Madrid in July 2023 from Leicester City, for whom he made 98 league appearances in total, scoring four goals and providing one assist.

The defender debuted in a LaLiga fixture for Atlético Madrid on August 14, 2023 as a substitute versus Granada aged 27 years and 83 days. In his LaLiga career overall, he has played six times in the competition.
